name: testing-assistant-project
description: Developer Testing Assistant Kit - Automated testing scenarios from GitHub PRs and Jira tickets

scripts.build:all: bun run build && bun run build:mcp
scripts.build:cross: bun run build:linux && bun run build:windows && bun run build:macos
scripts.build:linux: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile=dist/tap-linux-x64 src/main.ts && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 --outfile=dist/tap-linux-arm64 src/main.ts
scripts.build:linux:mcp: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile=dist/mcp-server-linux-x64 src/mcp-servers/atlassian-mcp/server.ts && bun build --compile --target=bun-linux-arm64 --outfile=dist/mcp-server-linux-arm64 src/mcp-servers/atlassian-mcp/server.ts
scripts.build:windows: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile=dist/tap-windows-x64.exe src/main.ts && bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64-baseline --outfile=dist/tap-windows-x64-baseline.exe src/main.ts
scripts.build:windows:mcp: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64 --outfile=dist/mcp-server-windows-x64.exe src/mcp-servers/atlassian-mcp/server.ts && bun build --compile --target=bun-windows-x64-baseline --outfile=dist/mcp-server-windows-x64-baseline.exe src/mcp-servers/atlassian-mcp/server.ts
scripts.build:macos: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile=dist/tap-macos-x64 src/main.ts && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile=dist/tap-macos-arm64 src/main.ts
scripts.build:macos:mcp: mkdir -p dist && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile=dist/mcp-server-macos-x64 src/mcp-servers/atlassian-mcp/server.ts && bun build --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile=dist/mcp-server-macos-arm64 src/mcp-servers/atlassian-mcp/server.ts
scripts.build:all:cross: bun run build:linux && bun run build:linux:mcp && bun run build:windows && bun run build:windows:mcp && bun run build:macos && bun run build:macos:mcp
